attributes.action: abolish any requirement by the state for schools to provide "a daily act of collective worship".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a national disgrace and embarrassment that in 2010 there remains a statutory requirement that schools provide facility for collective ritual acknowledgement that a religious paradigm which includes worship of a supernatural being sustained by magic is a seriously real and officially approved proposition. Children should not be subjected to such absurd propaganda under any circumstances but least of all under the auspice of schools and, by association, education.

Referring to the "broadly Christian" religious traditions of this country references an archaic period which has lacked currency for at least a generation.
